purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the further characterization and classification of a work order as defined by Application Module 10303-1043 (work_order).

inscope.li: the specification of the definitions needed to assign management resource information to a work order or a class of work orders;
the specification of the definitions needed to classify work orders;
the classification of a work order.

outscope.li: the definition of classes of work orders.

uof.name: Work_Order_Characterized
uof.description: The Work_Order_Characterized UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of characterized work order data.
